#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define LL unsigned long long
#define MOD 1000000007

LL modPow(LL A,LL B)
{
	LL X=1;
	while(B)
	{
		if(B&1)
		X=(X*A)%MOD;
		
		A=(A*A)%MOD;
		B>>=1;
	}
	return X%MOD;
}

LL InverseMod(LL A)
{
	return modPow(A,MOD-2);
}

LL Catalan(long N,long R)
{
	vector<LL>F(N+1,1);
	for(long i=2;i<=N;i++)
	{
		F[i]=(F[i-1]*i)%MOD;
	}
	
	LL A=(InverseMod(F[R])*InverseMod(F[R+1]))%MOD;
	return (F[N]*A)%MOD;
	
}
int main() 
{
	int T;
	long N;
	scanf("%d",&T);
	while(T--)
	{
		scanf("%ld",&N);
		printf("%llu\n",Catalan(2*N,N));
	}
	return 0;
}
